scripts.sprites_from_maps: node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -w src/spriteCreator.ts -e ts --exec node -- node_modules/ts-node/dist/bin.js ./src/spriteCreator.ts -m cvtmaps -i ./src/public/maps -o /src/public/tiles
scripts.sprites_to_spr: node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -w src/spriteCreator.ts -e ts --exec node -- node_modules/ts-node/dist/bin.js ./src/spriteCreator.ts -m cvtsprites -i ./src/public/sprites_src -o ./src/public/spr
scripts.start:xnes: node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -e ts,js -i node_modules -- node_modules/ts-node/dist/bin.js xnesRunner.ts
scripts.start:electron: npm run build && npm run electron
scripts.server:dev: node node_modules/nodemon/bin/nodemon.js -w webpack.config/server.ts -w webpack.config/server.dev.ts --exec node -- node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli.js --config webpack.config/server.dev.ts
